name: Unscrabbler
tagline: A Java application that finds anagrams using a Trie.
body: I used a Trie to structure a dictionary in order to search for anagrams of some user entered letters. It also gives the score in Scrabble. I think I will definitely be improving this soon and making it into an Android app.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
